explains: n. 哈密瓜；香瓜；[园艺] 罗马甜瓜

sentences.en: I start to cut the cantaloupe for my sons' breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我开始切哈密瓜给儿子们当早餐。

sentences.en: Watermelon, cantaloupe and honeydew are all healthy options for your pooch.
sentences.cn: 西瓜、哈密瓜和蜜瓜都是狗狗的健康选择。

sentences.en: In the real world, what we should be eating is spinach, brussels sprouts and cantaloupe—not as compelling for many of us.
sentences.cn: 在现实生活中，我们应该吃的是菠菜，抱子甘蓝和哈密瓜——这对我们很多人来说不是那么有吸引力。
